Question 40.Response: allowed me to understand the content better then and there without having to wait to ask, it creates information in simple ways that i can understand and allows me to understand the content better whereas with the teacher it can be confusing as times as they may use more longer words with starts to get confusing and not using simpler terms so everyone can understand
